dialogue.introduction: It's Isuzu, remodelled. Leave anti-submarine and anti-air roles to me!
dialogue.library_intro: Isuzu was built in the Taisho period (1912-1926) as the second of the Nagara Class light cruisers. As you might expect my speed is top-rate; the Admirals that commanded me in history include Admiral Yamamoto Isoroku, Admiral Yamaguchi Tamon, and many other pillars of the Navy. Amazing, huh?
dialogue.secretary1: Idiot, do you want me to shoot you?
dialogue.secretary3: Huh? I got distracted. What was it you wanted?
dialogue.secretaryidle: I-It's not like I'm bored! I'm not! Okay!? (Kai Ni)
dialogue.secretarymarried: Idiot, don't worry so much. It's fine to take a break.
dialogue.wedding: The admirals I've had as my partners have all had great success. Isoroku, Tamon... I wonder what will become of you? I'm looking forward to it.
dialogue.show_players_score: There's a report for you. Read it well.
dialogue.equipment1: Heheh, that'll do. Now I'm more ready to fight!
dialogue.equipment2: That modernization... saved me. Now I can work harder!
dialogue.supply: Oh, supplies... I can fight on with these!
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: Idiot - don't worry so much. I'll be fine with a quick rest.
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: It's okay, if I rest a little, one way or another I'll be better.
dialogue.docking_complete: A ship has been fully repaired.
dialogue.return_from_sortie: It seems the fleet has returned to base.
dialogue.start_a_sortie: Well then, I will show you the strength of remodelled Isuzu!
dialogue.night_battle: A pursuit battle is Isuzu's speciality!
dialogue.night_attack: Idiot, do you want me to shoot you?
dialogue.artillery_spotting: Idiot, do you want me to shoot you?
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: Idiot, do you want me to shoot you?
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: Idiot, do you want me to shoot you?
dialogue.mvp: Huh? Isuzu is No.1? Well, that's what you'd normally expect. Ain't it good?
dialogue.moderately_damaged: It's only the equipment on the surface that's damaged at most. The engines are still fine!
dialogue.sunk: I overdid it slightly, huh...? Nagara, Natori, be well...
